likes.fullText:
we have started to port @bruno_simon's threejs journey lessons to react to ease the learning curve https://t.co/FvgwmsrQe1 lead by @HazemOIbrahim, it's open source, contribute if something's missing!

the focus is on the experience, we use eco system spare parts where possible. https://t.co/XmhsQ2SQsC

likes.fullText: Ok. So there is one more thing I love about grease pencil. It's the sculpting tools. If you combine them with interpolation, than you can get some nice effects and save a lot of time. #greasepencil #b3d #b2d https://t.co/85I1VoRxSP

react_tweet_data.text: Ok. So there is one more thing I love about grease pencil. It's the sculpting tools. If you combine them with interpolation, than you can get some nice effects and save a lot of time. #greasepencil #b3d #b2d https://t.co/85I1VoRxSP
